sentences.english: We will promote integrated military and civilian development, increase defense-related research, and strengthen the development of weapons and equipment.
sentences.chinese: 推动军民融合式发展，加强国防科研和武器装备建设。

sentences.english: The first lesson the soldier had to learn, therefore, was to cultivate good relations with the people.
sentences.chinese: 因此战士必学的第一课就是搞好军民关系。

sentences.english: The army and the people are as inseparable as fish and water.
The Party Representative of the Detachment, Hong Changqing educates the soldiers and the people with the bitter experience of Qionghua's family.
sentences.chinese: 娘子军党代表洪常青以琼花的世代怨仇教育广大军民。

sentences.english: And Josue came, and all the army with him, against them to the waters of Merom on a sudden, and fell upon them.
sentences.chinese: 若苏厄遂率领自己的军民突至默龙水旁，向他们进攻。

sentences.english: Army-people unity as a people, and proved the world who can.
sentences.chinese: 军民团结如一人，试看天下谁能敌。

sentences.english: Airships, as a kind of suspending aircraft, have been widely used in the civil and military fields.
sentences.chinese: 飞艇做为悬浮式航空器，广泛应用于军民领域。

sentences.english: Several were visibly coordinating with military officers, even setting up joint military-civilian checkpoints.
sentences.chinese: 有些明显与军官合作，甚至设立了军民检查点。

sentences.english: The Border Region started a series of partial counter-offensives against Japanese positions.
sentences.chinese: 边区军民开始向日军据点发起了一系列局部反攻。

definition: (in former times) upper, middle and lower army/army of right, center and left/(in modern times) the three armed services: Army, Navy and Air Force
